abstract: The pharmaceutical company said it had collected some 40 percent of the shares of its rival in a tender offer.
snippet: The pharmaceutical company said it had collected some 40 percent of the shares of its rival in a tender offer.
lead_paragraph: Mylan fell short in its hostile takeover campaign for its fellow drug maker Perrigo, disclosing on Friday that it did not collect enough of its target’s shares to go through with its $26 billion bid.

headline.main: Mylan Falls Short in Hostile Bid for Perrigo
headline.print_headline: Hostile Bid by Mylan for Perrigo Falls Short

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
